description.en:
We are looking for a dedicated, passionate, and talented team member who wants to work with us on a full-time basis, to help us educate the public on the power of E-Commerce. This person should share the basic qualities of creativity and integrity within the team.

To be part of our dynamic team, you must be adaptable, self-motivated, and willing to work hard in a fast-paced environment. If you believe that you are an innovative marketer that can help us maintain and improve a strong communication network with external stakeholders of the company, apply now!

Your day-to-day:

  • Assist in digital and social media campaigns to drive customer acquisition, customer engagement, and customer retention.
  • Execute brand activation programs that involve database management, SMS campaigns, telemarketing campaigns, and email campaigns.
  • Managing project deliverables, monitoring, and updating work in progress.
  • Conduct a post-campaign analysis to evaluate the effectiveness of campaigns.
  • Work closely with the internal team to meet deadlines and deliverables.
  • Assist in tasks related to Customer Relationship Management as and when being assigned
  • Assist Product Marketing Manager and other members of the Marketing Department with any ad hoc responsibilities.

Requirements:
  • Candidates must possess at least a Degree/Diploma in Marketing/Business Studies/Administration/Management or equivalent.
  • At least 1-2 years of experience in marketing.
  • Able to create content in Malay/English.
  • The ability to write/speak in Mandarin is a bonus!
  • Excellent interpersonal skills, able to understand people's concerns to develop insights.
  • Well organized, responsible, and dedicated, with the ability to work on multiple projects and deliver refined content in a short time while effectively managing expectations.
  • Proficient in Microsoft Office, particularly Word, Powerpoint, and Excel.
  • Experience in using content management systems, design and/or mailing software, coordinating events, and working with agencies a plus.
  • Ability to meet project timeline.
  • Versatility to build rapport with people at all levels.

Reporting Line:
  • Product Marketing Manager

Apply now

description.en:
We are looking for a Key Account Manager to create long-term, trusting relationships with our merchants. The Key Account Manager’s role is to oversee a portfolio of assigned merchants, develop new business from existing merchants, and actively seek new sales opportunities.

Your day-to-day would include:

  • Operating as the lead point of contact for any and all matters specific to your assigned merchants.
  • Set up and product training for AVANA Platform.
  • Conduct merchant workshops for potential leads and existing merchants.
  • Develop online shopper insights and support strategies and plans that deliver category growth based on online consumer, shopper, and online customer requirements.
  • Develop and propose the online picture of success for the category. Support its implementation and continuously review the effectiveness of online activities.
  • Develop and strategize media buying for Facebook, Instagram, and Google Shopping Ads
  • Consultation on location when requested.
  • Building and maintaining strong, long-lasting merchant relationships.
  • Generate new business using existing and potential merchant networks.
  • Resolve conflicts and provide solutions to customers in a timely manner.
  • Specific areas of focus will be managing relationships and capabilities to enhance consumer value and accelerate growth. This includes data/measurement, customer activations, sales planning, and operations.
  • Leverage data & experience to pull out business trends to share internally and with the customer, continuously develop & measure test & learns.
  • Participate in merchant engagement activities such as roadshows, guest speaker roles, etc.

Key KPIs:
  • Work with assigned merchants to grow their MoM sales by 5%.
  • Develop on-trend strategies to help merchant scale their business reach.
  • Learn and educate the team, merchants, and partners about the latest updates in the industry.
  • Troubleshoot with merchants to identify their pain points and plan for a solution.
  • Feedback user experience to the team for continuous rapid improvement to the platform.

Requirements:
  • Proven work experience as a Sales Account Manager or Sales Account Executive.
  • Hands-on experience in sales in an eCommerce industry.
  • Knowledge of eCommerce /online sales is compulsory and to continuously keep up-to-date with the latest trends, features insights.
  • Familiarity with sales performance metrics.
  • An ability to deliver projects and answer inquiries on time.
  • Possess at least a Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or relevant field.
  • Sales Planning Expertise – ability to manage/measure sales planning, coordinating with B&M teams, and leading customer activation/site experience with cross-functional leads.
  • Customer management experience – as evidenced by previous roles with responsibility for customer strategy and execution.
  • Strong analytical skills – as evidenced by high intelligence and previous ownership of comprehensive analytical tasks and projects.
  • Marketing expertise – as evidenced by having supported the development and execution of marketing programs as well as partnering with brands on product innovation.
  • Planning skills - as evidenced by the capability to develop tools such as annual plans and forecasts that incorporate Sales and Marketing input.
  • Strong problem-solving capabilities – as evidenced by a track record of finding feasible solutions to complex problems, especially in an environment with incomplete information and tight timelines.
  • Sound communication skills – as evidenced by the ability to educate and influence management and staff to act in the best interest of internal and external stakeholders through written and verbal communications.
  • Resilience – as evidenced by the courage to maintain a positive attitude when faced with obstacles and the willingness to develop alternative approaches to overcome them.
  • Bias for action – as evidenced by a track record of taking decisions to drive the interests of the business while still maintaining the highest levels of rigor and compliance.
  • People who think big, solve problems, and aren’t afraid to get their hands dirty.

Reporting Line:
  • Ecommerce Consultant: Zodie
  • Group COO: Yienyee

Apply now

description.en:
Job Description:

  • Develop and conceptualize engaging creative content direction for marketing and sales campaigns.
  • Curate and create well-researched, must-share stories that would be of high interest to Malaysians.
  • Identify social media trends and create content based on those trends, with a local twist.
  • Come up with really clickable headlines and brainstorm ideas.
  • Ideate and execute on content growth hacks to increase AVANA viewers.
  • Write, edit and oversee all of AVANA collaterals which relates with content and copywriting across all departments and channels.
  • From EDMs, social media postings and taglines to scripts and large-scale campaigns, your copy will touch every part of AVANA.
  • Organise end-to-end on all of marketing collaterals and attend production shoots and events.
  • Collaborate with other departments to determine consistency in copy tone and style, ensuring that it complements accompanying artwork.
  • Collaborate with designers to develop engaging and inspiring creatives.
  • Maintain high standards of content development and outcome with quality control exercise across all deliverables.
  • In the loop of fast paced industry and wide trends to create engaging and culturally relevant marketing content with these 4 criteria - To Entertain / To Inspire / To Educate / To Convince
  • To use, to analyze and to optimise on AVANA web traffic and all marketing platforms using Google Analytics, Google Trends and other equivalent digital or social tools for content producing to achieve business target.
  • Able to produce and design content marketing strategies and set short + long term goals.


    • Requirements:
    • Candidate must possess at least a Certification from Google or Facebook
      • The Fundamental of Digital Marketing
      • Advance Google Analytics
      • Google Analytics Individual Qualification
      • Google Ads Display
      • Google Ads Search
      • Google Ads Video
      • Google Shopping Ads
    • Candidate should be a digital enthusiast who can think out of the box.
    • At least 3 year(s) of working experience in content marketing.
    • Agency experience strongly preferred, contributing to the areas of planning, strategizing and vendors management.
    • Keep up-to-date on the latest creative content strategies.
    • Highly proficient in Malay and English.
    • Ability to meet deadlines and adapt quickly to changes.
    • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
    • Independent and requires minimal supervision.
    • Fun with a positive nature mindset and attitude.
    • A customer-driven approach and good commercial awareness.
    • Effective time management and organisational skills with the ability to set priorities and achieve deadlines and targets.
    • Problem identification and solving skills.
    • Knowledgeable in creative storytelling techniques with commercial and digital approaches.
    • Knowledgeable to use Google Analytics, Google Trends and Social Media Analytic Tools.

      • Apply now

Job Description:

  • Responsible for analyzing, executing, managing optimising media buys and doing tagging setup in major digital advertising platforms (Google, Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, Twitter, SEO, SEM and etc) and improving campaign performance.
  • Familiar with platforms like Google Analytics and be able to create custom data models.
  • To optimize online ads through Google Adwords to drive qualified traffic on a continuous basis.
  • To work on SEO to ensure the company website is optimized on search engines.
  • Competent with online advertising, Google Search adwords, Google Display Networks, Social Media Ads, SEO/ SEM and other digital advertising platforms.
  • Build and execute social media strategies through competitive research, platform determination, benchmarking, messaging, and target audience identification.
  • Pull, analyse, and report marketing and business data to identify trends and patterns that reveal behaviour and habits.
  • Stay current on trends in digital marketing, best practices, and emerging products and platforms.


    • Requirements:
    • Candidate must possess at least a Certification from Google or Facebook.
      • The Fundamental of Digital Marketing
      • Advance Google Analytics
      • Google Analytics Individual Qualification
      • Google Ads Display
      • Google Ads Search
      • Google Ads Video
      • Google Shopping Ads
    • Candidate should be a digital enthusiast who can think out of the box.
    • At least 3 year(s) of working experience in digital marketing.
    • Agency experience strongly preferred, contributing to the areas of planning, strategizing and vendors management.
    • Knowledge of digital tracking & measurement (Google Analytics/ Google Tag Manager/ Google Ads/Facebook Business Manager).
    • Proficient using Google analytics, advanced knowledge of Google AdWords, Facebook Ads and other digital marketing platforms.
    • Excellent grasp of the latest tools and developments in the digital/ social media world.
    • Keeps up-to-date on the latest SEO/ SEM strategies.
    • Ability to speak and write in Malay and English

Responsibilities:

  • Design and build advanced applications for the iOS platform
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.
  • Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
  • Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency

Skills and Qualifications:
  • BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
  • Proven working experience in software development
  • Working experience in iOS development
  • Have published one or more iOS apps in the app store
  • Experience working with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, Core Graphics and Core Text
  • Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
  • Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
  • Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle

Additional Info:
  • Programming languages : swift Framework : Xcode Database : REST API , Firebase
Apply now

Sales Consultant represent AVANA and sell AVANA products or services to SME, KOL, Celebrities, businesses or government agencies. They contact potential leads, present products and services, answer questions and discuss pricing.

Responsibilities:

  • Builds business by identifying and selling prospects; maintaining relationships with clients.
  • Identifies business opportunities by identifying prospects and evaluating their position in the industry; researching and analyzing sales options.
  • Sells AVANA as a platform by establishing contact and developing relationships with prospects; recommending solutions.
  • Maintains relationships with clients by providing support, information, and guidance; researching and recommending new opportunities; recommending profit and service improvements.
  • Identifies product improvements or new products by remaining current on industry trends, market activities, and competitors.
  • Prepares reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing information.
  • Maintains quality service by establishing and enforcing organization standards.
  • Maintains professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; reviewing professional publications; establishing personal networks; benchmarking state-of-the-art practices; participating in professional societies.
  • Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
  • Giving sales presentations to a range of prospective leads.
  • Coordinating sales efforts with marketing programs.
  • Understanding and promoting company programs.

  • Prospecting Skills
  • Meeting Sales Goals

description.en:
We are looking for an experienced project manager to grow regionally with us. This person should share the same vision with us to be the No.1 social commerce enabler in South East Asia.

To be part of our dynamic team, you must be adventurous, entrepreneurial, self-motivated, and passionate about the e-commerce ecosystem. If you believe that you could be a passionate project manager that could help us maintain and improve a strong communications network with external stakeholders of the company, apply now!

Your day-to-day would involve:

  • Research, identify, and develop new business opportunities and viable income streams.
  • Plan, develop, and oversee the overall strategy of the special project department.
  • Negotiate with customers (potential and existing).
  • Identify, develop, and negotiate with potential vendors and business partners.
  • Take a lead role in the development of proposals and presentations for new business materials to create and nurture business opportunities and partnerships.
  • Manage all aspects of sales engagement and account management.
  • Build and develop trusted relationships with existing and potential clients.
  • Create and develop project costing, pricing, and business proposals.
  • Negotiate terms & conditions and contracts to successful closure.
  • Coordinate and maintain a close working relationship with the internal operation team to ensure successful project deliverables.
  • Consistently meet or exceed a special project target and achieve KPI.

Requirements:
  • At least 5 Year(s) of working experience in the related field (e-commerce, logistics, business development, partnership and etc)
  • Preferably Manager specialized in Marketing/Business Development or equivalent.
  • Strong project management skills
  • Good stakeholder management
  • Possess an entrepreneurial mindset
  • Great communication and interpersonal skills
  • Speak and write English and Bahasa Malaysia fluently

Reporting Line:
  • Malaysia Country Manager: Yien Yee

Apply now
